text: Obi-Wan Kenobi is a live action Star Wars television series released in 2022 on Disney+. It was directed by Deborah Chow and takes place ten years after Revenge of the Sith. The show lasts six episodes. == Story == Former Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi is called on a mission to rescue Princess Leia, who has been captured by the Galactic Empire's Inquisitors (Jedi-hunters). == Main cast == * Ewan McGregor as Obi-Wan Kenobi, a former Jedi * Vivien Lyra Blair as Leia Organa, the ten-year old princess of Alderaan * Hayden Christensen as Darth Vader, a former Jedi who turned evil * Moses Ingram as Reva Sevander, an Inquisitor * Indira Varma as Tala Durith, a former Imperial who helps Obi-Wan * Rupert Friend as the Grand Inquisitor, the leader of the Inquisitors Category:Star Wars television series Category:2022 American television series debuts Category:2022 American television series endings Category:Disney+ original television series
title: Obi-Wan Kenobi (TV series)
